Greensboro.Steven Tanger Center for the Performing: Steven Tanger Center for the Performing Arts in downtown Greensboro, North Carolina is a $78.1 million 3,000-seat performing arts facility scheduled to open in 2020. It will replace 2,400-seat War Memorial Auditorium in the Greensboro Coliseum Complex; the auditorium was torn down in October 2014. The Community Foundation of Greater Greensboro raised $35 million privately, to be paid over ten years.
